channel.title: Typora on Autumn Memo
channel.description: Recent content in Typora on Autumn Memo

item.title: Memo Sys by HUGO and Typora
item.description: Set Up Env install GO and hugo install theme cd <YOUR Bolg Root Dir> git clone https://github.com/flysnow-org/maupassant-hugo themes/maupassant Hugo command hugo server -t maupassant it will server the website on local machine hugo -D -t maupassant it will generate the statistic-files to public folder Note that the asset (image/video) would not be copy to the public folders.. Writing Adding your md file into the contect and then compile
